attributes.action: Reduce Oswestry's business rates and help save our town centre
attributes.additional_details:
The Oswestry and Border Counties Advertizer and our readers are fighting to have business rates reduced in a bid to revitalise our town centre.
Having already reached enough signatures to spark a debate with Shropshire councillors, we are now looking to do the same in the House of Commons.
This online petition coincides with petition slips that are available in our newspaper and petitions available within the town.
